stimulusHtml: Write, but do not evaluate, an integral expression that gives the total distance traveled by the particle from time t = 0 to time t = 6.

features.html: For 0 ≤ t ≤ 12 , a particle moves along the x-axis. The velocity of the particle at time t is given by v(t) = cos(π/6t) . The particle is at position x = -2 at time t = 0.
